column4: is there a way to have ffmpeg encode the audio streams in mp3 with ubuntu?
you know which path to follow?
the right path: google ubuntu mp3
what do you think i've been doing for some time now?
well... have you found an answer ?
i have a specific question on how-to enable mp3 encoding in ffmpeg with ubuntu that is not on the wiki
OK. sorry. I don't understand. are you trying to use libffbmeg via programming ?
no i'm resizing an avi for use on pocketpc with ffmpeg, and i think i can get better results encrypting the audio stream in mp3
you're right... you should run ffmpeg binary and see if it was compiled with --enable-lame
it's not compiled with mp3lame, and there's no sources in the repositories
i want to follow this walkthrough i just found: http://po-ru.com/diary/fixing-ffmpeg-on-ubuntu/
